com.smartnsoft.droid4me.widget

Class SmartHardGallery

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.AdapterView<android.widget.SpinnerAdapter>

            • android.widget.Gallery
              • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.widget.SmartHardGallery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class SmartHardGallery
extends android.widget.Gallery
    A gallery with a hard-sliding behavior.

    This gallery prevents from swiping multiple gallery panes at a time.

    Since:
    2011.10.20
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier

      • setDisableRequestLayout

        public void setDisableRequestLayout(boolean disableRequestLayout)
        Indicates whether the gallery should handle the layout requests. By default, nothing is disabled.
        Parameters:
        disableRequestLayout - if set to true, all View.requestLayout() invocation will be ignored
